price: ߊ߬ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ ߢߓߊ ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߬ ߢߊ߯ ߌ ߟߊ߫ ߝߟߌ߬ߓߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla al-mala-u min qawmihi innā lanarāka fī ḍalālin mubīnin
